ioformat

Class DistanceMatrixIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.DistanceMatrixIO

  • public class DistanceMatrixIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles some basic IO operations for reading and writing the distance matrix from and to files in the format that is used throughout this library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistanceMatrixIO()

    • Method Detail

      • printDMatToFile

        public static void printDMatToFile(float[][] distMat,
                   java.io.File dMatFile)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Print the distance matrix of the currently considered dataset to a file for later loading.
        Parameters:
        distMat - float[][] that is the upper triangular distance matrix.
        dMatFile - File that is to contain the distance matrix data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadDMatFromFile

        public static float[][] loadDMatFromFile(java.io.File dMatFile)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Load the upper triangular distance matrix from a file. This is done when the distance matrix had already been calculated in the past, in order to avoid needless repetitive calculations.
        Parameters:
        dMatFile - File containing the distance matrix data.
        Returns:
        float[][] that is the loaded distance matrix.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • printDMatToStream

        public static void printDMatToStream(float[][] distMat,
                     java.io.Writer writer)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Print the distance matrix of the currently considered dataset to a file for later loading.
        Parameters:
        distMat - float[][] that is the upper triangular distance matrix.
        writer - Writer to print the distance matrix data to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadDMatFromStream

        public static float[][] loadDMatFromStream(java.io.Reader reader)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Load the upper triangular distance matrix from a file. This is done when the distance matrix had already been calculated in the past, in order to avoid needless repetitive calculations.
        Parameters:
        reader - Reader to load the distance matrix from.
        Returns:
        float[][] that is the loaded distance matrix.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
